definition: constituting an imitation, someone who mimics (especially an actor or actress), imitate (a person or manner), especially for satirical effect
details:
adjective
- constituting an imitation
= example: constituting an imitation
noun
- someone who mimics (especially an actor or actress)
= synonyms: mimicker
verb
- imitate (a person or manner), especially for satirical effect
= example: imitate (a person or manner), especially for satirical effect
= synonyms: mime
